name: MuseumBuddy tour guide app (first design)
description:
My firstborn app design!


Am I completely happy with the result? No.


But I do like it a lot more than I thought I would at the beginning. I focused on a broad target demographic and tried to make it visually pleasing for both young and old, while also considering edge cases.


Edge cases being the real-life situations I've encountered working in my current job. in a museum.

See why I chose this prompt?


Some users will be using mobility aids, some will be neurodivergent, some will be hard of hearing or have low vision, some will be less tech-sav than others.


It was a challenge to design for all these users, so if you spot any opportunities to improve on, hit me with it!
